meta.name: Campaign Play-Along
meta.description: Join the MythosBusters Discord server for the Campaign Play-Along!
meta.author: CPA Organizers

cards.name: In the Thick of It
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, suffer 2 total physical and/or mental trauma. Then, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Hunted
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When the first Mythos phase of the game begins: Reveal cards from the top of the encounter deck until you reveal an enemy. Draw that card. Shuffle the encounter deck.

cards.name: Isolated
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation and only if there is a single investigator in the campaign.
Choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: See Beyond
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, add a random basic weakness to your deck. Then, choose a card cycle (such as Edge of the Earth.) That cycle is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Zealot's Sacrifice
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, choose either Core/Revised Core and Return to the Night of the Zealot, or the Investigator Starter Decks: remove the chosen set from your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Then, choose a card cycle (such as The Dream-Eaters or Edge of the Earth.) The chosen cycle is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Legacy of Dunwich
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Dunwich Legacy CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Dunwich Legacy expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Memories of Carcosa
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Path to Carcosa CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Path to Carcosa expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: The Colour of the Vale
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Feast of Hemlock Vale CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Feast of Hemlock Vale expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Expedition Log
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Edge of the Earth CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Edge of the Earth expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.text:
[reaction]When you complete The Circle Undone CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card from The Circle Undone expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.flavor: You have succeeded in reaching the Dreamlands, but this is not quite what you expected. You are in the Underworld, and it will take some work for you to find your bearings in this sinister place.
cards.name: Entering the Underworld (v. III)
cards.text: Plain of the Ghouls cannot be flipped. Forced - After an enemy with 1 or more clues on it is defeated: Take control of each of those clues. You cannot advance this act except by the below objective. Objective - When the Enchanted Woods (Stone Trapdoor) is put into play: Advance.

cards.name: Another Path
cards.text:
Just as you are about to turn away, you catch a glimpse of something strange at the corner of your eye. Investigating further, you can hardly believe what you find: you are certain this is a momento from one of your friends trapped in the dream! On second thought, these woods deserve a more thorough examination. Perhaps you can find evidence of which way your friends went.
Add 1[per_investigator] clues to the Enchanted Woods. Shuffle the set-aside Terror of the Vale and Nightgaunts encounter sets into the encounter deck, along with the discard pile.

cards.name: Dreaming of Sleep
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract when assembling investigator decks, and only if you are playing The Dream-Quest. When you accept this contract, choose [per_investigator] cards. Those cards are added to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - After choosing investigators, flip this card over.

cards.name: Dreaming of Sleep
cards.text: Choose one investigator to become the bearer of the False Awakening weakness (The Dream-Eaters #233). For the remainder of this campaign, any time the bearer of the False Awakening weakness leaves the campaign for any reason, choose a new investigator to become the bearer of the False Awakening weakness, and add it to that investigator's deck. Forced - If an investigator is instructed to add False Awakening to their deck, the bearer takes 1 mental trauma instead.

cards.flavor: The more you look, the more evidence you find that you're on the right path.
cards.name: The Ascent
cards.text: Plain of the Ghouls cannot be flipped. Forced - After an enemy with 1 or more clues on it is defeated: Take control of each of those clues. Objective - Only investigators at the Enchanted Woods (Stone Trapdoor) may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance. (Beware - Any investigator who is not at the Enchanted Woods (Stone Trapdoor) will be left behind and will not be able to continue the campaign.)

cards.name: A Way Out
cards.text: - Each investigator who is not at Enchanted Woods (Stone Trapdoor) is left behind and is killed. Each surviving investigator loses each of their clues. - Record in your Campaign Log the dreamers strayed from the path. - Remove each location other than Enchanted Woods (Stone Trapdoor) from the game (or place it in the victory display if it has Victory X and no clues on it). Discard all non-weakness enemies and treacheries in play, then remove the encounter deck and encounter discard pile from the game. - Gather all cards from the following encounter sets: Beyond the Gates of Sleep, Agents of Nyarlathotep, Zoogs, Dreamer's Curse, Dreamlands, and Chilling Cold. - Remove the current agenda from the game and replace it with Agenda 1a: "Journey through the Gates". Move all doom to the new agenda. - Put Act 4a: "The Path" into play. Remove each other act from the game. - For each damage on the scenario reference card, record 3 tally marks next to "Steps of the Bridge" in your Campaign Log. Move all damage on the scenario reference card to the agenda as doom, then replace the scenario reference card with the scenario reference card for Scenario I-A: Beyond the Gates of Sleep. - Put The Enchanted Path into play, revealed side face up. Put the 6 remaining Enchanted Woods locations into play unrevealed. - Replace each [elder_thing] token in the chaos bag with a [tablet] token. - Set the following cards aside, out of play: Randolph Carter (Expert Dreamer), the Laboring Gug enemy, the two double-sided enemy cards (Nasht and Kaman-Thah), and each of the remaining locations. - Shuffle the remaining scenario cards to form the encounter deck. - Move each investigator to The Enchanted Path. - You are now considered to be playing Scenario I-A: Beyond the Gates of Sleep.

cards.name: The Cat's Pajamas
cards.text: Boon. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, add Cat Mask and Katarina Sojka to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When an investigator has "broken the law of Ulthar": Exile all copies of Cat Mask and Katarina Sojka (wherever they are) and remove them from the card pool for the remainder of this campaign.

cards.name: Fear Made Manifest
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per campaign. Accept this contract only during deck creation, and only if you are playing The Dream-Quest.
When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.
Then, add the Your Worst Nightmare weakness to your deck.
Then, in your Campaign Log, next to "Evidence of Kadath", record 1 tally mark.

cards.name: Sleeping to Dream
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract when assembling investigator decks, and only if you are playing The Web of Dreams. When you accept this contract, choose [per_investigator] cards. Those cards are added to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - After choosing investigators, flip this card over.

cards.name: Sleeping to Dream
cards.text: Choose one investigator to become the bearer of the False Awakening weakness (The Dream-Eaters #275). For the remainder of this campaign, any time the bearer of the False Awakening weakness leaves the campaign for any reason, choose a new investigator to become the bearer of the False Awakening weakness, and add it to that investigator's deck. Forced - If an investigator is instructed to add False Awakening to their deck, the bearer takes 1 physical trauma instead.

cards.name: Sleep Paralysis
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per campaign. Accept this contract only during deck creation, and only if you are playing The Web of Dreams.
When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.
Then, add the Narcolepsy weakness to your deck.
Whenever you check the number of tally marks recorded next to "Steps of the Bridge" in the Campaign Log, you are considered to have 3 fewer tally marks recorded there.

cards.name: Whispering Woods
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during setup for Scenario I-A: Beyond the Gates of Sleep. [reaction] When you draw a non-weakness encounter card: Look at cards from the top of the encounter deck until you look at a card with the hidden keyword, add it to your hand, and shuffle the rest into the encounter deck. Then, cancel all effects of the triggering card and discard it. Any investigator may trigger this ability. (Group limit once per game.) Forced - After advancing to Act 4a of Scenario I-A: Beyond the Gates of Sleep, search the encounter deck for Ancient Zoog and put it next to the agenda deck. For the remainder of the scenario, its Forced effect is active.

cards.name: Ultimate Infestation
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during setup for Scenario I-B: Waking Nightmare. [reaction] When you would place a swarm card: Look at the top card of your deck. You may place that card as normal. Otherwise, you must place the next card of your deck (without looking at it). Any player may activate this ability. Limit once per round. Forced - When you are instructed to assemble the infestation bag, replace the tokens listed with: [skull], [skull], [tablet], [tablet], [tablet], [cultist], [cultist].

cards.name: Curiosity Killed the Cat
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only after Interlude I: The Black Cat, and only if you asked for it. When you accept this contract, choose [per_investigator] cards. Those cards are added to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Then, each investigator whose deck does not contain a weakness with the [[Madness]] trait must swap a basic weakness in their deck for a random basic weakness with the [[Madness]] trait. Flip this card over for the remainder of the campaign.

cards.name: "We're all mad here."
cards.text: Ultimatum. Forced - When gathering cards during setup, gather The Cheshire Cat from the Cheshire Cat encounter set. Put The Cheshire Cat (Frustrating Feline) into play in the lead investigator's play area. Forced - Whenever an investigator draws a [[Madness]] weakness: Flip the Cheshire Cat, then that investigator takes control of The Cheshire Cat, then that investigator may shuffle any number of cards from their hand back into their deck and draw that many cards.

cards.name: Adopted by Ulthar
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during Interlude I: The Black Cat, and only if the black cat is at your side. When you accept this contract, add the Pawralysis weakness to your deck for the remainder of the campaign. You have an additional ally slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Creature]] asset.

cards.name: Pawralysis
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Pawralysis to a non-weakness asset with the highest printed cost that takes up a hand slot or ally slot. If you cannot, shuffle Pawralysis back into your deck. Treat the attached asset as if its printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]] and forced abilities). [action][action]: Pet the damned cat. Discard Pawralysis.

cards.flavor: The Corsairs have your trail now, and their pursuit intensifies with each day that passes. Perhaps seeking Kadath is an accursed venture after all. Even so, you feel compelled to continue. What proof could the resting place of the gods hold for you?
cards.name: Sworn Pursuit
Corsair Ambush!
cards.text:
The Corsairs are hot on your trail. Like pack hunters, they surround you. Fighting desperately, you manage to fend them off, this time. But the noose continues to tighten with each escape and you know you cannot elude such dogged pursuers for much longer.
Place 1 resource next to the agenda deck. Each investigator takes 1 damage and 1 horror for each resource next to the agenda deck. Flip this agenda back to agenda 2a and continue playing.

cards.name: Resolute Journey
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during setup for Scenario II-A: The Search for Kadath. Remove Agenda 2a - "Agents of the Outer Gods" from the game and replace it with the new Agenda 2a - "Sworn Pursuit."

cards.name: Psychic Emanations
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during setup for Scenario II-B: A Thousand Shapes of Horror. Replace the Forced effect on Agenda 2a and 3a of Scenario II-B: A Thousand Shapes of Horror with: "Forced - At the start of your turn, if The Unnamable is ready, and if it is at your location or you are at a non-[[Graveyard]] location: Test [willpower] (2). Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1 for each location away from The Unnamable you are. If you fail, it attacks you (even if it is not engaged)." Forced - If an investigator adds The Silver Key to their deck, flip this card over and add it to that investigator's deck.

cards.name: Psychic Emanations
cards.text: Permanent. Bearer of The Silver Key only. The Silver Key does not take up an accessory slot. [action]: Search your deck and discard pile for The Silver Key and add it to your hand. Forced - If another investigator becomes the bearer of The Silver Key, remove this card from your deck and add it to theirs (even if that investigator is taking part in a different campaign).

cards.flavor: Beauty, cool aloofness, philosophic repose, self-sufficiency, untamed mastery - where else can we find these things with even half the perfection and completeness that mark their incarnation in the peerless and softly gliding cat?
cards.name: Beloved of Bast
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during Interlude II: The Oneironauts, and only if the black cat is at your side. [free] Exhaust Beloved of Bast and spend 1 resource: Search your collection for a Stray Cat and add it to your hand. Forced - When the game ends, or when a Stray Cat that is not in your deck would be defeated or discarded: return it to your collection.

cards.name: Adversary of Ulthar
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during Interlude II: The Oneironauts and only if you asked for it. Forced - When the game begins: Shuffle Cats of Ulthar into the encounter deck. [free] Search your deck for a basic weakness and remove it from the game. Any investigator who has broken the law of Ulthar may trigger this ability (Limit once per game for each investigator).

cards.name: High Alert
cards.text: Myriad. Accept this contract only during setup for Scenario III-A: Dark Side of the Moon. When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When the game begins, raise your alarm level by 1.

cards.name: Distorted Dreams
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept only during setup for Scenario III-B: Point of No Return. When you accept this contract, each investigator chooses one card name. That card is added to their card pool for the remainder of this campaign. Forced - When the game begins, place 1 damage on the scenario reference card.

cards.name: Feline Fealty
cards.text: Limit 1 per campaign. Accept this contract only during Interlude III: The Great Ones and only if the black cat is at your side is currently recorded in your Campaign Log and has never previously been crossed off. Add a copy of The Black Cat to your deck.

cards.name: Black Cat Crossing Your Path
cards.text: Limit 1 per campaign. Accept this contract only during Interlude III: The Great Ones and only if the black cat warned the others is recorded in your Campaign Log and the black cat is at your side has never previously been recorded. Remove all [tablet] and [elder_thing] tokens from the chaos bag for the remainder of the campaign.

cards.name: Seek the Gods
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during setup for Scenario IV-A: Where the Gods Dwell. When you accept this contract, you may erase any number of tally marks next to Evidence of Kadath in your Campaign Log. For each tally mark thusly erased, place 1 resource on this card (from the token pool), as a portent. [action] Spend 1[per_investigator] portents: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a card with the hidden keyword and add it to your hand. Any investigator at your location may activate this ability.

cards.name: Eight-Legged Nightmare
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during setup for Scenario IV-B: Weaver of the Cosmos. After assembling Atlach-Nacha, also arrange 4 cards from the top of the lead investigator's deck (shuffling their discard pile back into their deck if necessary) around Atlach-Nacha, so each touches a different location not yet touched by a copy of Legs of Atlach-Nacha (see suggested play area on Discord). For all game purposes, these cards are treated as copies of Legs of Atlach-Nacha (they are placed in the victory display once defeated).

encounter_sets.name: A Thousand Shapes of Horror CPA 2025
Beyond the Gates of Sleep CPA 2025
Dark Side Of The Moon CPA 2025
